summary:
Chretien Linssen is Project Manager /Business Consultant, started as project manager at Gemeente Eindhoven Jan 1st 2021.

Chretien has a strong record in improving business processes and ICT. In his assignments he has proven that a thorough analysis of the problem first leads to an effective and efficient execution of change. He has worked in industry for among others ASML, DSM Dyneema, DAF, Philips, NUON, BAM and in civil service for ContourdeTwern, Amsterdam, Utrecht (in combination with Wigo4it).

Chretien’s experience as a self-starter helps him to adapt easily to new customer organizations. His ability to analyze rapidly complex business processes, combined with his decisive working method and a good environmental sensitivity serve him in leading his assignment to the targets set.He has a strong eye for potential problem areas and will use, whenever required unconventional ways and methods to overcome them. 

Chretien’s flexibility, analytical qualifications, clear communication and no-nonsense leadership are appreciated by his customers. He has developed a good feeling for the broad line as well as details, relevant for the different organizational cultures (industry, banking, and services).

Specialties: Project Management (IT related and non-IT related), Consultancy, Logistics, Supply Chain Management with experience in Expert Systems or APS, Management of Change. 

Contact: chretien.linssen@live.com.

projects.title: Manager Implementation Werk
projects.description:
The city of Utrecht, together with 3 biggest cities in the Netherlands (joint in the organization Wigo4it) develop a new application for the departments of Social Welfare of these cities. Wigo4it is there joint ICT company. The new application, Edison, has a web based portal and Microsoft Dynamics as back-end. The applicant for social welfare has access to its own data through the web. It is possible to exchange information with the department through the system. The objective is to lead the applicant towards a paid position. 
Chretien is familiar with social welfare and the necessary ICT systems. He contributes in the development of the system (business process management). He plans and manages the implementation of the system in Utrecht. Part of the work is testing the new implementation with social service employees. Implementation is to design work processes, making instructions, training personnel, communication with stakeholders. The assignment is in a complex environment, with many different stakeholders (4 different cities related to Wigo4it). Chretien is used to act in competitive political environments.
The first release of Edison is implemented in June 2017. At the last tests software issues made a change in implementation method necessary. Chretien and his team acted swiftly and were flexible to secure implementation in June. In September 2017 software issues were solved and original way to use the system is implemented.

projects.title: projectmanager MAPP2.0 and Planning+
projects.description:
BAM Rail is in an active phase. The organization is constantly changing, only minimal resources are available for new developments. Chretien was successor of a highly regarded project manager. The assignment is twofold:
1.	The functional development and management the implementation using scrum of a maintenance control system for rail equipment.
2.	To manage the implementation of 5 new features in the personnel scheduling system (Monaco). 
The maintenance control system has gone live end of October’15. Next actions are implementing the delivered functionality and ensure further development to improve the system.
For Monaco the new features have been delivered and implemented. The new system is in full use at BAM Rail.

projects.title: Project manager DAF ITD
projects.description: Chretien replaces the project manager to manage the Cisco Phone Improvement project for the rollout phase. Objective of the project is to replace all analogue phone equipment with digital, Cisco  equipment. The project scope is about exchanging about 4000 phones and several other devices using analogue phone lines (fax, modem, intercom, security equipment). NExt to this project Chretien finished 2 other projects and was working on a global Paccar project.

projects.title: Project lead BLIK
projects.description:
ContourdeTwern is a foundation that in assignment of several municipalities in Noord-Brabant and Zuid-Holland executes activities in social wellbeing, youth work and voluntary work. The foundation has 500 employees and works with about 5000 voluntary workers.
ContourdeTwern develops together with ICT supplier XLAB a new application BLIK. The BLIK system is for registration and managing operational process and accountability to the municipalities. 
Chretien knows this kind of ICT developments (analogies with Mendix development at BAM Rail) and he knows the context form social well fare. He ensures a planned approach with a clear focus. He is also a collaborative foreman in designing work processes and related application development.
After intensive work in the last weeks of december’17 both application and conversion is finished and the BLIK application has gone live. After handling issues to ensure a smooth working of the application a new phase in professionalizing for both ContourdeTwern and it’s ICT supplier is started under new project lead.

projects.title: projectmanager Sintel Atos - Philips
projects.description: Atos implements for a part of the Philips server park event logging. Philips wants to monitor security events on their servers. Atos project is not able to deliver according to plan with escalation to higher management. Chretien is asked to step in and restructure the project and perform external communication to Philips. Chretien managed to get phase 1. on track and normalize the relationship to the customer.  Phase 2. is replanned and currently running according to plan. For phase 3. the proposal has been made including the planning and awaits approval from customer Philips. The project is back on track and further management is handed over to project manager Atos MS

contributors.headline: Project & Program Manager at Atos Origin

projects.title: projectmanager nWWB Armoede
projects.description: To ensure a smooth start in January 2015 of the new bill WWB (Wet Werk en Bijstand) an implementation plan is being made. Main elements are instructing and training employees, communication including knowledge management internally and external towards customers and institions. And especially for poverty regulations and subsidies implementing and executing new regulations.

contributors.headline: Interim information & cyber security professional bij The Future Group

projects.title: project responsible Logistics&ICT at DWI
projects.description: DWI (Dienst Werk en Inkomen) is the social security department of the city of Amsterdam. Part of the service is to support clients in their quest to find a paid job. The project wants to support the clients in this quest. The project will interview these 15.000 clients within a period of 8 months, diagnose what is needed and define a path towards paid work. Next to the diagnosis a group training in empowerment is organized for about 3000 clients for which this is part of there path towards paid work. Existing facilities (at ReIntegratieBedrijf Amsterdam, Work Service Point are activated and reinforced for thos clients for which these facilities are part of there path. Project is finished successfully: all interviews have been conducted in time, group training ended as planned end of march 2014, evaluation and recommendations have been made.

contributors.headline: Digital Product Manager Nature Based Solutions
Strategisch adviseur organisatieontwikkeling bij het Ministerie van EZK & LNV

projects.title: Projectmanager SFC Intermediate Solutions at ASML
projects.description: The initiation and management of IT projects for the program Shop Floor Control Intermediate Solutions to support production management. Structure of the projects is always retrieve data from SAP R3 to Oracle database. Build java-webbased applications to present data to support production management.

projects.title: Projectmanager MES at DSM Dyneema
projects.description: DSM Dyneema will introduce a new and improvement Manufactoring Execution System (MES). Production data to be used by the MES will be generated by one new application SCADA and by an update of the existing DCS System. Chretien's role is to generate the functional designs for these systems (total value 2.5 Mio Euro), to find suppliers and generate fixed price proposals fitting the new (still in development phase) MES.

projects.title: Projectmanager HYPE at DSM Dyneema
projects.description: The HYPE Program is started to manage innovation in production from idea generation till implementation. Objective is to improve production by 15%. The program consists of some 30 projects over 2 years with a budget of several million dollars. Chretien Linssen manages the global program office and is projectmanager for all projects at the Heerlen manufacturing site.

projects.title: Projectmanager Network Nuon
projects.description: Projectmanager for Atos Origin CU Nuon specializing in network related projects. The role is partly executing projects, partly specifying Nuon's demand and generating project proposals. Value of contracts ranges from 300 kEuro 2.000 kEuro. The challenge is to balance goals and interests of Nuon, Atos Origin CU Nuon and delivery units from Atos Origin. Part of the role is the liaison between Nuon and Atos Origin in for instance delivering proposals, tune expectations. Examples of projects are Upgrade glasfiber on location Spaklerweg, Amsterdam, Replacement of LAN Switches in location Harderwijk , Replacement of LAN Switches in main Nuon location Spaklerweg Amsterdam.

profile_positions.description: als projectmanager in het Sociaal Domein bij de gemeente Eindhoven leid ik allerlei soorten projecten.  Het zijn projecten om nieuwe wetgeving dan wel nieuwe beleidsdoelstellingen te implementeren, maar ook aanbesteding van applicaties of diensten.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Prodware Nederland is part of the Prodware Group with branches throughout Europa, Israel, Marokko, Georgie. Prodware is member of the Inner Circle of Microsoft Dynamics. Prodware implements Microsoft ERP-solutions (both Business Central as Finance & Supply Chain Management) and Microsoft CRM-solutions.
Chretien as projectmanager leads implementation project for both CRM- and ERP-solutions. He participates from early start, making proposals to managing the operation till closure of the project. He lead several CRM and ERP projects. He is committed to customer satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description: On a secondment basis I help organisation in making projects successful. My role is divers, from projectmanager to informatie/business analyst. I worked for various companies in industry (Nuon, Philips, DSM, ASML, BAM, DAF) and civil service (Amsterdam, ContourdeTwern, Utrecht). My assignments are mostly combining ICT-development  and production improvement.
profile_positions.title: Project & Transition Manager

profile_positions.description: Performed projectmanagement assignments at various companies (Nuon, Philips, DSM, ASML, DWI) in ICT and production improvement.
profile_positions.title: Executive Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Performed project management assignments:
Design and implementation of a new planning method at NedTrain Services for their 5 railcars maintenance plants.
Design refurbishment for an office floor as part of the Atos housing program.
ICT Projectmanager at Philips IT Services BNL in Eindhoven area.
profile_positions.title: project manager

profile_positions.description: Performed logistics consulting assignments at Philips Assembleon, Nihot Luchttechniek, Foppe Paling/Zalm, Scania Zwolle.
profile_positions.title: Logistiek Adviseur

profile_positions.description:
Performed project managers role for the following projects: 
"Dynamische Reisinformatie": generate a strategy on and initiate projects for "Dynamische Reisinformatie". 
"Reisinformatie materieel Sprinter": design travel information system for the railcars "Sprinter".
"Servicelijn": develop the new service for customers on stations without NS personel, and implement the new service.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager

profile_positions.description: As internal consultant for the department Logistics at Dutch Railways I did all kinds of planning improvement assignments and I was involved as planning expert in several planning software development projects. Important was the design and build of specific schedulingssoftware for railway planning.
profile_positions.title: Logistiek Adviseur
